worker.command:
# Check OS version and repository [ -r /etc/os-release ] && source /etc/os-release if [ $NAME == "SLES" ]; then if [ $VERSION_ID -ge 12 ]; then ADD_REPO='http://download.suse.de/ibs/Devel:/Virt:/Tests/SLE_12/Devel:Virt:Tests.repo' fi else # OpenSUSE repository if [ $VERSION_ID -ge 13.1 ];then ADD_REPO='http://download.opensuse.org/repositories/Virtualization:/Tests/openSUSE_13.1/Virtualization:Tests.repo' fi fi
if [ -n $ADD_REPO ]; then zypper --non-interactive addrepo --refresh $ADD_REPO; zypper --non-interactive refresh && zypper --non-interactive install virt-test; /usr/share/qa/qa_test_virt-test/bin/qa_test_virt-test-run; else echo "Could not find suitable repository" 1>&2 fi
